price: 44. Tu n’étais pas (ô Muhammad) sur le flanc ouest (du Mont), lorsque Nous dictâmes Notre ordre à Moïse, et tu n’en étais pas témoin.
arabic: وَمَا كُنتَ بِجَانِبِ ٱلۡغَرۡبِيِّ إِذۡ قَضَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَى ٱلۡأَمۡرَ وَمَا كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wamā kunta bijānibi al-gharbiyi idh qaḍaynā ilā mūsā al-amra wamā kunta mina al-shāhidīna
